author: Staff Reporter
text:
The headmaster of Government High School at Iduvai, M. Mani, submitted a report to Chief Educational Officer, on Friday confirming that the student, R. Krishnasamy (15), was sent by the science teacher A. Manimeghalai to buy tea for her on Thursday, but he had no knowledge of this until after the accident. Krishnasamy, the IX standard student was injured when a motorcycle hit the cycle he was riding on the way back from tea stall.

“I did not know that Krishnasamy was sent to buy tea and some medicine by Manimeghalai till I got the news that the boy sustained injuries and was taken to the hospital. Hence, I had suggested departmental action against the teacher concerned,” Mr. Mani said. He disclosed some of his observations included in the report to the CEO.
title: HM submits report to CEO
